comment: The size of the set of closed walks (defined as words) with a fixed length which is a prime number is the product of the number of equivalence classes for ` .~ ` over the set of closed walks and the fixed length. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Jun-2018.) (Revised by AV, 1-May-2021.)
